TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebEventFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 设置 ASP.NET 状况监视事件信息的格式。

span.span: Formats ASP.NET health monitoring event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 是用于统一格式化与事件相关的信息的支持类型，如果必须记录事件数据，稍后向用户显示这些数据，这会很有用。The is a supporting type used to uniformly format event-related information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 类的实例 作为参数传递给运行状况事件类型定义的格式设置方法。Instances of the class are passed as arguments to the formatting methods defined by the health-event types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来设置事件信息的格式。The following code example shows how to use the to format event information. 它主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。It is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#17)]

param.name: s
param.span: 要添加到事件信息中的字符串。

span.span: The string to add to the event information.

summary.span: 将指定的字符串和一个回车追加到事件信息。

span.span: Appends the specified string and a carriage return to the event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许您通过添加自己的特定于事件的数据来自定义事件信息。The method allows you to customize the event information by adding your own event-specific data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#20)]

span.span: Gets or sets the indentation level.

value.span: 缩进等级使用的制表符的数量。

span.span: The number of tabs used for the indentation level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您控制事件信息的缩进方式。The property allows you to control how the event information is indented. 缩进的基本单位由 属性定义。The base unit of indentation is defined by the property. 对于每个缩进级别，增加一个选项卡缩进。For each indentation level, you increase the indentation one tab. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 获取或设置制表符大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab size.
The number of spaces in a tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你控制写入事件信息时使用的选项卡大小。The property allows you to control the tab size used when writing event information. 确定每个缩进单位的空格数，由属性控制 。The determines the number of spaces per unit of indentation, controlled by property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString() cil managed

summary.span: 以字符串格式返回事件信息。

span.span: Returns the event information in string format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用内部 变量存储事件信息。The uses an internal variable to store the event information. 此 方法允许您获取字符串格式的所有信息。This method allows you to get all the information in a string format.
